title: Borderless problem
body: So I play league like normal, but then today when I log in and play mis fortune, my game keep showing the taskbar on the side and would hide it, I running the game in borderless and this never happen before, anyone can fix this problem? I tried to max the resolution, change to full screen then back to borderless, restart the game, create a new game but none of this work.

replies.body: Nevermind, after I reinstall everything was back to normal
This same thing has been happening to me, I play on borderless but the task bar stays visible, I would like it to go away like it did before.

I'm not entirely sure I understand what you want to happen. Is it that you want the taskbar to stay visible, or is it that you want the taskbar to not show up at all and you to get an entire screen of League?
